summary: Manages the end‑to‑end diffusion workflow that transforms textual descriptions into visual outputs. It encodes prompts, prepares latent representations, applies stochastic noise and denoising operations through mixing layers, and finally decodes the processed latents into images.
business_intent: Enable developers and enterprises to integrate high‑quality AI‑generated imagery from text prompts into products such as advertising, design tools, and creative platforms.
